name: Chromatic Climber
description:
This four level platformer game makes use of 3.5 D techniques with the player navigating six superimposed 3 D maps. In addition to standard platforming, the player must shift colors as they jump in order to be supported by the next block. The vector of vision also has a color component, and knowing when to look redward and when to look blueward is key to solving later puzzles.

Built in 13 hours for the ALLIES Game Jam on 10/27/2018
